tool_description: SharpAPI is AI-powered Swiss Army Knife API for every software developer.  It can save countless hours and supercharges any app with AI capabilities with just a couple lines of code.
name: SharpAPI
title: SharpAPI

api_list.name: jobStatus
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sharpapi.p.rapidapi.com/v1/job/status/9e0f60b8-0299-46e9-be2e-02e216b8dc66"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sharpapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
